title: 117. Chandigarh:Possibility in Engaging the Unknown in the Incomplete with Remi Papillault
itunes:title: 117. Chandigarh:Possibility in Engaging the Unknown in the Incomplete with Remi Papillault
description: This week, we sit down with Remi Papillault to discuss the topic of his new book, and the subject of his ongoing interests: the development of Chandigarh and Le Corbusier’s hand in its shaping.
content:encoded: This week, we sit down with Remi Papillault to discuss the topic of his new book, and the subject of his ongoing interests: the development of Chandigarh and Le Corbusier’s hand in its shaping.
